Persona 1.Name: Jane
Persona 1.Backstory: health nut. no chemicals, plant nut. had her dog stung by a wasp

Persona 2.Name: Jill
Persona 2.Backstory: neatness freak. wants high performaing products. was once bit by a poisonous spider

Persona 3.Name: John
Persona 3.Backstory: fast food and fast cars. good old boy - doesn't care about all this sustainability stuff. very suspicious of technology

Persona 4.Name: Mary
Persona 4.Backstory: Mary takes immense pride in her home and views it as an investment for future generations. She once discovered a rodent infestation in her pantry, which not only destroyed food but also caused structural damage, resulting in significant financial costs. This experience traumatized her, making her extremely vigilant about keeping her home spotless and pest-free. She now regularly invests in premium pest control services and products.

Persona 5.Name: Ethan
Persona 5.Backstory: Ethan is deeply committed to sustainability and ecological preservation. A traumatic incident during his college years when a pest control company inadvertently wiped out a bee population near his home sparked his extreme focus on eco-friendly pest solutions. Ever since, Ethan has been on a mission to find pest control solutions that do not harm pollinators or disrupt natural ecosystems.
